page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: N AT THE TIME OF WRITING THIS IS A VERY TOPICAL MATTER IN NORTH SOMERCOTES SINCE THE SECONDARY SCHOOL IS UNDER THREAT OF CLOSURE. THERE ARE TWO SCHOOLS IN THE VILLAGE ;THE SECONDARY SCHOOL IS JOHN BIRKBECK HIGH SCHOOL AND THERE IS A JUNIOR SCHOOL CALLED NORTH SOMERCOTES CHURCH OF ENGLAND SCHOOL. THE LATTER IS MUCH THE OLDER AND DATES BACK TO THE LATE 17TH C.THOUGH THE OLDEST EXTANT BUILDINGS ARE DATED 1854.THERE WERE SIGNIFICANT EXTENSI0NS IN 1876 AND FOLLOWING THE 1944 EDUCATION ACT.THE HEADMASTER'S HOUSE DATES FROM 1864 AND AT PRESENT THERE ARE 250 CHILDREN TAUGHT BY 7 TEACHERS. UNTIL 1964 THE C.OF E.SCHOOL WAS AN ALL AGE SCHOOL WITH ITS COMPLEMENT OF PUPILS RANGING IN AGE FROM 5 TO 15 YRS.THOUGH THE BRIGHTER 20% MOVED TO
